traits.name: Rampage
traits.detail: When you reduce a target to 0 hit points with a melee attack on your turn, you can spend a bonus action to move up to half your speed and attack a different target.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.detail: At the start of your turn, you can gain advantage on all melee attacks you make for that turn. However, all attacks against you gain advantage until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Icarus makes four attacks: two with his claws, one with his tail, and one with his bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 20 (4d6+6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 10 (1d8+6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a [dc-secondary] STR save or fall prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 24 (4d8+6) piercing damage, plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (recharge 5-6)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 90' cone must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take 16d10 cold damage (half damage on save).
